mYxLZtP-EYaNm6okH.name: Directional
mYxLZtP-EYaNm6okH.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

mEwhF_MNXBCYFQezm.name: Tough Skin
mEwhF_MNXBCYFQezm.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

mOLT_bJKn3aOE6_q2.name: Oxygen Storage
mOLT_bJKn3aOE6_q2.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

mg3qy0-C515jS_AI1.name: Oxygen Storage
mg3qy0-C515jS_AI1.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

m3vX8y5-Xgi1QuzSU.name: Oxygen Storage
m3vX8y5-Xgi1QuzSU.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

mvcq2aXoqpx6GYIAg.name: Oxygen Storage
mvcq2aXoqpx6GYIAg.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

mlWWV7fKk_0hTZVSO.name: Oxygen Storage
mlWWV7fKk_0hTZVSO.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

myhuUrArETT0tdTNq.name: Diffuse
myhuUrArETT0tdTNq.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mRJc_55sYVMbFTk0y.name: Homogenous
mRJc_55sYVMbFTk0y.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mJoKKsaiswV7oIcFf.name: No Blood
mJoKKsaiswV7oIcFf.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

mDLVTWMzUDxhjk44H.name: No Brain
mDLVTWMzUDxhjk44H.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

m2a6MHVhScsLYPVAe.name: No Eyes
m2a6MHVhScsLYPVAe.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

myADHdW5YJBAcle9w.name: No Head
myADHdW5YJBAcle9w.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mHIVA8CdlMrVj9Bye.name: No Neck
mHIVA8CdlMrVj9Bye.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mA52X44KjLwBOQ25l.name: No Vitals
mA52X44KjLwBOQ25l.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

meY9xfHNj93tRPhbQ.name: Unliving
meY9xfHNj93tRPhbQ.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

mceIAEjGzKqLnwTdC.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

mL34q1fbc86L8BD-m.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

m6O6_r7K5r1OjyNc2.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist
